Act in favours of the brewers of Edinburgh, and liberties thereof; and other adjacent brewers. Edinburgh, August 6. 1695. Scotland. Privy Council.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty, Edinburgh : 1695.
Caption title. Initial letter. Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti Concilii. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
